title: Steven Soderbergh’s “Kimi” Is a Tech Thriller That Packs a Potent Outrage - The New Yorker
content: Steven Soderbergh’s “Kimi” Is a Tech Thriller That Packs a Potent Outrage  The New Yorker
description: The film is built as an ordinary genre piece, but that format disguises its uncommon substance and power.
